segments.text: Did you put the blue bin out on the street ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you'd better take it out front .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time does the recycle truck come by ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It usually gets here at noon on Tuesday , which is tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll just take it out to the street tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Every morning you get up late and rush off to work late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think I'll forget to do it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll remember to do it , but you won't have time to do it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , I'll take it out front right now .
segments.speaker: S2
